text: The Albania national rugby team is the representative of Albania in the rugby union. It was established on 6 February 2010 in Pordenone. The team's first international participation was at the "Alpe, Adria and Balkans Cup" on June 11, 2011 placing 6th.Kombëtarja Shqiptare e Regbisë, miqësore me Forlí 1979 ==See also== * Rugby union in Albania ==References== Rugby union Category:European national rugby union teams Category:Rugby union in Albania
title: Albania national rugby union team
